oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The mass and the charge changing cross sections recently measured in inverse kinematics are investigated microscopically in the framework of Glauber model using the ground state point proton/neutron densities obtained in the relativistic mean field/relativistic Hartree-Bogoliubov approach. As illustrative examples, explicit results for the nuclei spanning different regions of the periodic table, incident on C-12, hydrogen, and -CH2 targets are presented. The present study gives an excellent account of the experiment.
